name: NupkgRepack
description: Repacks a nupkg and removes items which have been URL encoded
author: Aderant (michael.baker@aderant.com)

inputs.name: searchPattern
inputs.label: Path to nupkg file(s) to repack
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Pattern to search for nupkg  files to repack.

You can separate multiple patterns with a semicolon, and you can make a pattern negative by prefixing it with '-:'.
